Rich was a disruptor in the best sense of the word: he came to the company and shook up the existing systems and archaic methodologies (in the process, making life much easier for me and my team). His leadership and knowledge is balanced well by his casual demeanor and sense of cool; you felt confident with him at the helm, and comfortable enough to question him on where he was steering the ship. He was always apt to do both. Sheer knowledge & experience, as well a morale-boosting, culture-building leadership: a true asset to any company.

Sarah Varki
Senior Product Manager, Mobile & Web
April 15, 2013, Sarah reported directly to Rich

Applico wouldn't be the same without Rich. He turned the product group around, created a better pricing model, and worked hard to get everyone excited about the things we were doing. He also wasn't afraid to get his hands dirty and be involved, be it poking around in some code himself, or even rescuing our wifi when it went down. Be it always being on top of the latest mobile news, or somehow managing to have 5+ devices of all shapes & sizes on him so he can try out new things, Rich lives & breathes mobile.

Federico Halperin
Founder at Kubikware (crafting awesome web, mobile and augmented reality apps)
April 28, 2016, Rich was a client of Federico’s

You can't fail with Fed in your corner!  He's a true partner who is always willing to do the impossible to ensure success no matter how ridiculous my needs were.  I hired Fed's resources for several projects, all with short timelines and terribly inadequate budgets yet he and his team of engineers (not just developers!) were always there.  Not just a great guy but he's someone I look forward to working with knowing he's going to make possible the impossible and you'll never see him lose his cool doing it.  Fed is always my first stop when I'm looking for top-notch people where I am comfortable that I have the support when I need it.  He should be yours too.
